Name: Chapter1_Part1_Bar_Dialog1_start_1
Phrase:
Narrator
Vanessa is in her room standing by the dressing table, Axel is standing behind her.

Name: Chapter1_Part1_Bar_Dialog1_start_2
Phrase: Vanessa takes a deep breath

Name: Chapter1_Part1_Bar_Dialog1_start_3
Phrase:
Axel
Why are you looking for it, Ma'am?

Name: Chapter1_Part1_Bar_Dialog1_start_4
Phrase:
Vanessa
Cause that's the last valuable thing I own, warden.
Right. Let's have a look.

Name: Dialog2_start_1
Phrase:
Narrator
Vanessa looks at the burlesque images on the wall.

Name: Dialog2_start_2
Phrase:
Vanessa
Look at these. "The most desired burlesque dancer in her Solar System".
Not a bad way to start a career. Anyway, that was a long, long time ago.

Name: Dialog2_start_3
Phrase: Anyway, back to reality

Name: Dialog3_start_1
Phrase:
Narrator
Vanessa looks at the bookshelf.

Name: Dialog3_start_2
Phrase:
Vanessa
Lots of books.
I often find book characters much more sophisticated than real life people. Such a shame.

Name: Dialog3_start_3
Phrase:
Vanessa
If only I met a person like...

Name: Chapter1_Part1_Bar_Dialog1_placeholder1_1
Phrase:
Axel
Need help?

Name: Chapter1_Part1_Bar_Dialog1_placeholder1_2
Phrase:
Axel
Did you check the jewelry box? I would place it there.

Name: Chapter1_Part1_Bar_Dialog1_placeholder1_3
Phrase:
Axel
Good luck then.

Name: Dialog4_start_1
Phrase:
Narrator
Vanessa checks her jewelry box.
Nothing here. Well, nothing that might come in handy in this shithole. Though I would appritiate some...

Name: Dialog4_start_2
Phrase: If only...

Name: Dialog5_start_1
Phrase:
Narrator
Vanessa opens the drawer of her dressing table and takes out the cigarette holder.

Name: Dialog5_start_2
Phrase:
Vanessa
There it is! Now, I'm ready to go...

Name: Dialog5_start_3
Phrase:
Axel
I'm sorry, Ma'am, did you say something?

Name: Dialog5_start_4
Phrase:
Vanessa
Now, to you.

Name: Dialog5_start_5
Phrase:
Vanessa
Did you get what I asked you?

Name: Dialog5_start_6
Phrase:
Axel
Absolutely. I brought you some little somethings! Your favorite cigarettes and some perfume.

Name: Dialog5_start_7
Phrase:
Vanessa
Oh, did you?

Name: Dialog5_start_7_a_1
Phrase:
Vanessa
You're a tryhard, warden. I've always had a soft spot for the most dedicated workers.

Name: Dialog5_start_7_a_2
Phrase:
Vanessa
Good for the business, yet completely clueless about their lives.

Name: Dialog5_start_7_a_3
Phrase:
Axel
Living on our inhospitable planet, one must learn to find pleasure in simple things, my lady.

Name: Dialog5_start_7_b_1
Phrase:
Vanessa
Trying hard to please me, warden?

Name: Dialog5_start_7_b_2
Phrase:
Axel
Seems like not hard enough, my lady!
